metadata.dc:author: Melgarejo Moreno, P
Sarroca Capell, E
Hellín Meseguer, D
metadata.dc:description: A rare case of vascular leiomyoma of the inferior nasal turbinate in a diabetic patient is presented. Local excision was performed under endoscopic control. There have not been signs of recurrence after 2 years follow-up.
metadata.dc:title: Angioleiomioma del cornete nasal inferior. A propósito de un caso y revisión de la bibliografía.
[Angioleiomyoma of the inferior nasal turbinate. A case report and review of the literature].
